item.title: vim配置
item.author: root@ysicing.net (ysicing)
item.description: 安装vim plug curl -fLo ~/.vim/autoload/plug.vim --create-dirs https://raw.githubusercontent.com/junegunn/vim-plug/master/plug.vim 写配置 向~/.vimrc写入 " autocmd BufWritePost $MYVIMRC source $MYVIMRC " 关闭兼容模式 set nocompatible " 设置行号 set nu "突出显示当前行,列 set cursorline set cursorcolumn &quo
